snippet: United Automobile Workers leaders said voting on a new labor agreement is tight at Ford, leaving the deciding votes in the hands of workers at three big plants.
abstract: United Automobile Workers leaders say small majority of workers at Ford Motor Company have so far voted against proposed new labor agreement.
lead_paragraph: United Automobile Workers leaders said voting on a new labor agreement is tight at Ford, leaving the deciding votes in the hands of workers at three big plants.

headline.main: Results of U.A.W. Vote Show Ford Pact Losing
headline.print_headline: Results of U.A.W. Vote Show Ford Pact Losing
